code: var CACHE_KEY='IS_DARK';export function getThemeCache(){var cache=null;try{var rawCache=localStorage.getItem(CACHE_KEY);if(rawCache){cache=JSON.parse(rawCache);}}catch(error){console.error(error);}return cache;}export function setThemeCache(isDark){try{localStorage.setItem(CACHE_KEY,JSON.stringify(isDark));}catch(error){console.error(error);}}
